dcterms:description: The Pancreas-CT dataset was acquired from either healthy kidney donors prior to nephrectomy or patients who neither had major abdominal pathologies nor pancreatic cancer lesions.
dcterms:title: Cancer Imaging Archive Pancreas-CT dataset

dcterms:description: The BTCV dataset consists of scans randomly selected from a combination of an ongoing cancer chemotherapy trial and a retrospective ventral hernia study.
dcterms:title: Beyond the Cranial Vault (BTCV) segmentation challenge

dcterms:description: This dataset provides information on the determination of normal splenic volume on computed tomography in relation to age, gender, and body habitus.
dcterms:title: Normal splenic volume determination dataset
